column2: setting of V2D buffer release method and delay. Num of entries of this table could be extended. Indexed by parameter [fifo_dly]

column7: Specify total VEX array + V2D + DigRF latency + margin (less the internal fixed pipeline delay) when FIFO_START_SOURCE =’0’.
column25: Additional delay (must be between 2 and 25) when FIFO_START_SOURCE = ‘1’. (Not used when FIFO_START_SOURCE = ‘0’.)
column29: bit vector to select which JESD linkes [0..3] should be used as trigger start. Bit0=1: select JESD link 0, bit1=1: select JESD link 1, etc
column34: this indicate the source to trigger when to start the FIFO (at the input to TX analog block) reading into TX analog block. from TX direction: 0:JesdRXStartQN --- in this case, the FIFO should be half-filled when FIFO reading is started, 1:TRXANT valids [3:0], 2:BFN Timed Event, 3:not used

column18: Set JESD latency count (latency match value) using DigRF clocks (triggered when JESD is started). It's jesd_start_dly + VEX/VHA process latency on channel 0
Set JESD latency count (latency match value) using DigRF clocks (triggered when JESD is started). It's jesd_start_dly + VEX/VHA process latency on channel 1
